form_description: Form to record explosive charging and blasting details.

fields.description: The name of the subsidiary managing this report
fields.label: Name of Subsidiary
fields.name: name_1
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the subsidiary

fields.description: The name of the mine where the report is being generated
fields.label: Name of the Mine
fields.name: name_2
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the mine

fields.description: The area for which the report is being generated
fields.label: Name of the Area
fields.name: area_name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the area

fields.description: The specific pit or patch covered in this report
fields.label: Name of the Pit/Patch
fields.name: name_3
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the pit or patch

fields.description: The contractor responsible for the work
fields.label: Name of the Contractor
fields.name: name_4
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the contractor

fields.description: The date for which the report is being prepared
fields.label: Date
fields.name: name_5

fields.description: The shift during which the report is applicable
fields.label: Shift
fields.name: name_6

fields.description: Details of the bench where explosives are used
fields.label: Bench
fields.name: bench

fields.description: Number of holes charged with explosives
fields.label: No. of Holes Charged
fields.name: holes_charged
fields.placeholder: Enter the number of holes charged

fields.description: Number of holes blasted with explosives
fields.label: No. of Holes Blasted
fields.name: holes_blasted
fields.placeholder: Enter the number of holes blasted

fields.label: Explosive Charged (Te)
fields.name: explosive_charged
fields.placeholder: Enter the amount of explosive charged (Te)

fields.label: Explosive Blasted (Te)
fields.name: explosive_blasted
fields.placeholder: Enter the amount of explosive blasted (Te)
